article_title: Local boxers LaManna, Davis earn victories at Claridge
article_text:
Quian Davis works out at the Vendetta MME Gym in Millville. He is training for his second professional match at the Claridge in Atlantic City on Saturday December 5th. Thursday December 3 2015 Quian Davis of Millville was the former all-time leading rusher at Buena Regional High School for football and also had a short stint in baseball's minor leagues with the Miami Marlins. He now is a professional boxer training with Irving Muse Sr. (The Press of Atlantic City / Ben Fogletto)

Boxer Quian Davis

Trainor Irving Muse Sr., of Bridgeton gloves Quian Davis for his work out at the Vendetta MME Gym in Millville. Davis is training for his second professional match at the Claridge in Atlantic City on Saturday December 5th. Thursday December 3 2015 Quian Davis of Millville was the former all-time leading rusher at Buena Regional High School for football and also had a short stint in baseball's minor leagues with the Miami Marlins. He now is a professional boxer training with Irving Muse Sr. (The Press of Atlantic City / Ben Fogletto)

og.description: Millville welterweight Thomas LaManna and Mays Landing heavyweight Quian Davis both registered victories Saturday night at The Claridge Hotel in Atlantic City.
